caption.p: Empirical scaling relationship (ESR) between changes in yearly maximum daily midday temperature and global temperature warming in the Mediterranean region based on simulations from the fifth phase of the Coupled Model Intercomparison Project (CMIP5), including explanatory annotations. The red line indicates the multi-model mean of the RCP8.5 CMIP5 simulations, and the blue line indicates the multi-model mean of the RCP4.5 CMIP5 simulations (from ref. [ 8], adapted from ref. [ 5]).
